name: Zyrion Inc

overview:
Zyrion is a provider of integrated Business Service Management (BSM) and Network, Server and Application Performance Monitoring solutions for mission-critical, , and complex IT environments. Zyrionâ€™s Traverse software provides seamless, correlated, end-to-end, service-oriented views of the performance of the entire IT infrastructure - physical, virtual and cloud.

Traverseâ€™s scalable, patented solution architecture can support tens of thousands of distributed end-points, and process millions of metrics in real-time. The softwareâ€™s Service Container technology supports creation of purpose-specific, logical management views of the network. Traverse is aligned with ITSM principles and the ITIL framework, and provides an open, extensible API for integration with the enterprise ecosystem.

Zyrionâ€™s solutions have been deployed by enterprises, service organizations, and governmental agencies, such as Cisco Systems, Ancestry.com, United States Postal Service, US Army, and Veterans Association. Zyrion has corporate offices in Sunnyvale, California.
